sentences.sContent: It sounds as though you enjoyed Peru.
sentences.sContent_eng: It sounds as though you enjoyed Peru.
sentences.sCn: 这听起来好像你喜欢秘鲁。

sentences.sContent: Well, in Peru you had to negotiate like that to get the freshest fish at the market.
sentences.sContent_eng: Well, in Peru you had to negotiate like that to get the freshest fish at the market.
sentences.sCn: 在秘鲁你必须这样还价你才能在市场上拿到最新鲜的鱼。
